meanings.definition: A person who is timid or easily scared.
meanings.sent1: The wusses ran away from the spider.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a wusses, face your fears!
meanings.sent3: The wusses screamed when they saw a tiny mouse.
meanings.sent4: The wusses trembled at the sound of thunder.
meanings.sent5: The wusses hid under the bed at the slightest noise.

meanings.definition: To act in a cowardly or timid manner.
meanings.sent1: Don't wusses out of the challenge, be brave!
meanings.sent2: He wusses whenever he has to speak in public.
meanings.sent3: She wusses every time she has to make a decision.
meanings.sent4: The team wusses when it comes to taking risks.
meanings.sent5: They wusses their way through the haunted house, screaming all the way.
